QuestData.Title: Primal Power
QuestData.Description:
I'm afraid it's becoming harder to maintain my mirror images. The Primalists are focusing their efforts to tearing me out from the sky.
Not to worry... I have a plan.
I need you to take the orb you recovered and gather elemental magic from slain Primalists.
We'll need that elemental power up ahead to divert their forces away from me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Elemental Focus to drain elemental energy out of slain Primalists and elementals.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Khadgar's projection further ahead in the Vakthros Range.
QuestData.RewardText: That orb is brimming with power! That will be perfect for what's next.
